SummaryEnglish: Fifty years in the future, after a terrifying alien species attacked our planet, teenager Stanford Yu works as a janitor at the Sky Corps Military Academy. But he’s only dreamed of one thing his entire life — to pilot a Robo Mech, giant robots from outer-space who came to our aid. When he finally gets his shot, Stanford and his classmates must put aside all personal differences and work together as a team in order to defend humanity against a new invasion of aliens.

1.SummaryEnglish: When two new Robo Mechs arrive, scrappy young academy custodian Stanford is determined to bond with them — and prove he's worthy of becoming a pilot.

2.SummaryEnglish: Stanford joins Frank and Maya as a Mech Cadet, but his lack of training shows. A jealous Olivia's mood shifts thanks to a surprising offer.

3.SummaryEnglish: During a training exercise led by Captain Tanaka, fiercely competitive Maya learns a valuable lesson. Dr. Miller studies the recovered Sharg eggs.

4.SummaryEnglish: Captain Tanaka readies Earth's defenses when a suspicious object appears in Mars' orbit. A chilling discovery forces a lockdown of the Sky Corps campus.

5.SummaryEnglish: A discouraged Stanford turns to his mom for support. With the other Robos sidelined, Captain Tanaka and Maya search for the remaining Sharg.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ava uncovers a shocking secret about Hero Force One. In the wake of a stunning reversal, a grateful Stanford grows closer to his fellow Cadets.

7.SummaryEnglish: Captain Tanaka leads the Cadets in an epic battle when a surprise attack puts Global Defense Ring units all over the world in jeopardy.

8.SummaryEnglish: Olivia takes it upon herself to check out the approaching Sharg ship. But when she spies something terrifying, the other Cadets rush to her aid.

9.SummaryEnglish: The team has Stanford's back as he attempts a daring repair in space outside of his Robo. A sinister threat targets the Sky Corps campus.

10.SummaryEnglish: Tanaka and the Mech Cadets decide to take on the Queen Sharg — but the plan is risky, putting more than one life at risk. Can they pull it off?
